item.title: Safai Karmacharis’ Commission is for addressing civic workers’ grievances, says chairman
item.description:
<![CDATA[P. Raghu, chairman of the Karnataka State Commission for Safai Karmacharis, has said that the commission was established to take the grievances of the karmacharis to the government and ensure solutions.
“Karmacharis should consider themselves equal to others in society who protect their children with higher-quality education,” he said.
He was interacting with the karmacharis at a meeting held in Raichur on February 19 to hear their grievances.
Mr. Raghu advised the karmacharis to stay attache...]]>
